text: Jean-Pierre Bastiani (6 June 1950 â€“ 27 August 2021) was a French politician. Bastiani was born in Toulouse, France. Bastiani was a member of the National Assembly between 1993 until 1997. Bastiani was Mayor of Auterive between 1989 until 2008 and again from 2014 until 2018. Bastiani died on 27 August 2021 at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Toulouse Category:French mayors
title: Jean-Pierre Bastiani
